Place pouchdb.min.js here to enable offline local fallback.

Download one of the following and save as:
  static/vendor/pouchdb.min.js

Option A (recommended, exact version used in code):
  https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/pouchdb-browser@9.0.0/dist/pouchdb.min.js

Option B (mirror):
  https://unpkg.com/pouchdb-browser@9.0.0/dist/pouchdb.min.js

After placing the file, restart the dev server:
  npm run dev -- --open

Then hard refresh your browser (Ctrl+Shift+R).
